mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USEDBOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME, COLLECTION_NAME, BRAND_NAME, USED_PRICE) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, 0, #{productTypeName}, #{collectionName}, #{brandName}, #{usedPrice})

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (FILE_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL, REF_NO, TYPE_NO) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, #{fileLevel}, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, 2)
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, PRODUCT_TYPE_NAME, BRAND_NAME, COLLECTION_NAME, BOARD_WRITER FROM USEDBOARD WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_NO = #{boardNo} AND TYPE_NO = 2 ORDER BY FILE_LEVEL ASC
